enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Kishan Kumarsingh (Trinidad and Tobago) introduced draft conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2004/L.28) and a bracketed draft decision (FCCC/SBSTA/2004/L.28/Add.1).
SBSTA adopted the draft conclusions without discussion.
The G-77/CHINA proposed to remove the bracketed text in the draft decision, which was then approved by Parties as amended to be forwarded to the COP.
